South_San_Francisco.Stonestown Galleria station:
Stownstown Galleria station is a light rail stop on the Muni Metro M Ocean View line, located in the median of 19th Avenue adjacent to Stonestown Galleria in San Francisco, California. It opened in 1925 with the first phase of the line and was rebuilt with a high-level island platform in 1993.


== History ==
When the M Ocean View line opened on October 6, 1925, it ran along the west side of 19th Avenue; a second set of lanes was added later, placing the line in the road's median.
